mapper.select: SELECT p.property_code AS propertyCode, p.property_city AS propertyCity, p.property_name AS propertyName, p.property_status AS propertyStatus, hg.hotel_group_name AS hotelGroupName FROM property p INNER JOIN hotel_group hg ON p.hotel_group_code = hg.hotel_group_code WHERE p.hotel_group_code = #{search.hotelGroupCode} ORDER BY p.property_name ASC
